#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;


long long int fast_pow(long long int base, long long int n,long long int M)
{
    if(n==0)
       return 1;
    if(n==1)
    return base;
    long long int halfn=fast_pow(base,n/2,M);
    if(n%2==0)
        return ( halfn * halfn ) % M;
    else
        return ( ( ( halfn * halfn ) % M ) * base ) % M;
}

long long int findMMI_fermat(int n,int M)
{
    return fast_pow(n,M-2,M);
}

int main()
{
    long long int fact[100001];
    fact[0]=1;
    int i=1;
    int MOD=1000000007;
    
    while(i <=100001)
    {
        fact[i]=(fact[i-1]*i)%MOD;
        i++;
    }
    
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,r;
        cin>>n>>r;
        
        if(r > n)
         cout<<"0"<<endl;
        
        else
         {
         long long int  numerator,denominator,mmi_denominator,ans;
    
         numerator=fact[n];
         denominator=(fact[r]*fact[n-r])%MOD;
        
         mmi_denominator=findMMI_fermat(denominator,MOD);
         ans=(numerator*mmi_denominator)%MOD;
        
         cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
